commands.name: roles
commands.description: will display all the self-assignable roles that exist

commands.name: Roles
commands.description: will display all the Mod/Exec/XP Assigned roles that exist

commands.name: .poll <arg>
commands.description: starts a yes/no poll where <arg> is the question

commands.name: .poll <arg0> <arg1> <arg2> (up to 12 arguments)
commands.description: starts a poll where <arg0> is the question and the remaining arguments are the options

commands.name: urban
commands.description: returns definition from urban dictionary of <arg>

commands.name: remindmein
commands.description: can be called like so: ".remindmein <2 hours> to <finish my assignment>"

commands.name: showreminders
commands.description: can be called like so: ".showreminders" to show all your active reminders and their corresponding messageIDs

commands.name: deletereminder
commands.description: can be called like so: ".deletereminder <messageId>" to delete a paricular reminder. the "messageId" can be obtained by using the ".showreminders" command

commands.name: .load <arg>
commands.description: loads the commands in the class <arg>. The classes and their corresponding commands can be determined using the ".help" command.

commands.name: .unload <arg>
commands.description: unloads the commands in the class <arg>. The classes and their corresponding commands can be determined using the ".help" command.

commands.name: .reload <arg>
commands.description: reloads the commands in the class <arg>. The classes and their corresponding commands can be determined using the ".help" command.

commands.name: .exc <arg>
commands.description: executes the command <arg> on the bot server. The classes and their corresponding commands can be determined using the ".help" command.
